raw_comment: Interestingly, I notice that this graph gives insight into social values and experiences from people all around the world. It shows us that the older demographic of people see more "ugly" in the world and believe that this will not change as time goes on. The correlation between developed countries and their percentage of 40+-year-olds is also interesting as it gives an indication that conflict experienced in developing countries may give a reason for those in developing countries to think that the world will not get better.
ace_sentences: I notice that this graph gives insight into social values and experiences of people around the world.
This graph shows that older people see more ugly things in the world.
This graph shows that older people believe that this will not change over time.
There is a correlation between developed countries and the percentage of people who are at least 40 years old.
This conflict may be a reason.
People in developing countries may think that the world will not get better.
